pages.text: The Undying Talisman revives the player once upon death and teleports the player 10 blocks backward. The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_advanced)Advanced Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_mystic)Force of Mystic$(/l).
